subject: Touch Me - Feel Me
text:
Walking through the wood, on a rainy day 
Looking at the sky through beautiful clouds, 
Some are white, and some are dark, 
Talking with each other in a thunder sound! 
Touch me - feel me. 
Feeling like touching deep inside cloud, 
Softer than a cotton and smoother like a silk, 
Rose petals are more softer but 
baby's cheeks are softer than all. 
Touch me - feel me 
Human heart is more delicate and softer than all 
But feelings are the most delicate and 
softest that all above. 
Because once they are hurt can't be 
mended or repaired, remains deep 
inside the heart but never forgotten. 
Touch me - feel me.
